projects.title: Phasing Elements
projects.description: An interactive environment to explore elements moving through space in patterened cycles. Using Vue.js to handle the internal methods and using Velocity.js to animate the dom elements.
projects.instruction: select an animation when you're ready to begin
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='phases - animating dom elements' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/WZmWoq/?height=636&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: WE ALL DESERVE A SAFE SPACE TO BECOME OURSELVES
projects.description: An experiment in programming an expressive, demonstrative language. A fluid language that takes shape and makes meaning. This is a poem I wrote and programmed using Chroma.js for color and Velocity.js for motion.
projects.instruction: Press the boxes to start poem
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='Everything We Are-Morphing Poem' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/oeGbWM/?height=300&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: Transformative Constellations
projects.description: An interactive interface to explore mental models of the relationships between us, our words, and the world. The diagrams are created with Cytoscape.js . The simple UI is constructed using CSS Grid Layout.
projects.instruction: Each node can be dragged and rearranged, as can the constellation as a whole.
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='Interactive Constellation Diagram CSS Grid Layout' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/eGOjZw/?height=495&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: IMAGINING THE SHADOW CAST BY OUR WORDS
projects.description: Playing with movement and meaning. Radiating colors and their corresponding constellation of feeling. Using chroma.js and velocity.js to do most of the heavy lifting.
projects.instruction: Press buttons above wonderland to change color theme.

projects.title: Transformative Language
projects.description: Velocity.js and Particles.js to create an interactive environment in honor of the goddess Octavia Butler.
projects.instruction: Hover and press on letters and particles to interact.

projects.title: Interactive Audre Lorde Reflection Activity
projects.description: Proof of concept for interactive activities that use vue.js to manage real time user input, and produce a manipulatable environment for users to engage with their own thoughts and lives as a site of reflection and transformation. This canvas uses raphael.js.
projects.instruction: Respond to the prompts, then press the ‘re-create’ button to generate an interactive canvas.

projects.title: Animating Elements w/ Velocity JS 1.0
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='phases - animating dom elements with velocity.js 1.0' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/ZXPbmY/?height=506&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: The Transformation Of Silence Web App
projects.description: Vue.js makes it incredibly easy to create dynamic web interfaces. Firebase makes it incredibly easy to create a persistent, realtime backend. Using VueFire here to make a dynamic full stack poetry web app. Uses CSS-Grid for UI.
projects.instruction: Respond to prompts to create a new poem in database.
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='vue and firebase transformation poetry webapp' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/yzKaVe/?height=646&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: MLK Interactive Constellation Of Concern
projects.description: An interactive model of Martin Luther King Jr's concerns as he describes them in his 16 August 1967 speech: 'Where Do We Go from Here', Delivered at the 11th Annual SCLC Convention in Atlanta, Ga.
projects.instruction: click and drag to manipulate canvas
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title=' cytoscapeJS_constellations_of_concerns' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/RKBMPP/?height=687&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: Interactive particles and words
projects.description: Part of a series of experiments with interactive words and particles using two of the JS libraries I love most: ParticlesJS and VelocityJS.
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='Interactive Particles and Words' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/jaYLLp/?height=507&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'>See the Pen <a href='https://codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/pen/jaYLLp/'></iframe>

projects.title: Refrigerator Magnet Poetry
projects.description: An update of an early project I did in grad school. On either side of the canvas are source materials which can be dragged on to the canvas to recreate a new poem.
projects.instruction: Enter and submit to title poem. The background color of canvas can be customized using RGB sliders
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='De-Tourned Refrigerator Magnet Poetry' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/egMGyb/?height=555&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: Typography Poem
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='slabtext_lining_js_typographyPoetry_thesis_2.0' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/LxKPjX/?height=540&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: Create L-Systems Art
projects.description: An L-system or Lindenmayer system is a parallel rewriting system and a type of formal grammar. Learn more about L-Systems here.
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='Create L-System Art' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/GyygGe/?height=713&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>

projects.title: An L-Systems Tryptic
projects.description: An L-system or Lindenmayer system is a parallel rewriting system and a type of formal grammar. Learn more about L-Systems here.
projects.link: <iframe height='100%' scrolling='no' title='An L-System Tryptic' src='//codepen.io/Daniel_Silber-Baker/embed/BJJyVX/?height=664&theme-id=26830&default-tab=result&embed-version=2' frameborder='no' allowtransparency='true' allowfullscreen='true' style='width: 100%;'></iframe>
